The Huskies throw out a runner at first base in their  home win Friday against Buffalo PERIOD NIU has won four consecutive games PERIOD

DeKALB  The softball team earned its first two wins of the young season in the College of Charleston Tournament.There is a lot of room for improvement but we are in a better spot this week than last week said Head Coach Christina Sutcliffe.Friday.. PERIOD

Head Coach Christina Sutcliffe and sophomore outfielder Katie Lamich celebrate during the last home game Saturday against Easter Michigan where the Huskies won  PERIOD

DeKALB  Softballcompleted its first conference sweep of the season when the Huskies beat the Eastern Michigan University Eagles in three games this weekend.The Huskies   MidAmerican Conference scored  runs against the Eagles .. PERIOD

DeKALB  Softball suffered its first series loss since April  when the Central Michigan University Chippewas defeated the Huskies in two of three games.The Chippewas   MidAmerican Conference took the first game Friday  and won the.. PERIOD

Junior pitcher Tara Thacker pitching during a March  game against the Bowling Green Falcons.The Huskies won their series against Western Michigan University PERIOD

DeKalb  Softball won its midweek matchup at home against the Ball State University Cardinals behind a strong performance from junior pitcher Tara Thacker PERIOD

The Huskies   MidAmerican Conference defeated the Cardinals   MAC  Wednesday at Mary M PERIOD Bell Field in DeKalb PERIOD

Thacker  pitched all seven innings giving up three earned runs on six hits with five strikeouts and seven walks PERIOD

Thacker did a really good job in the first and second inning of getting us off the field and making a pitch when they needed to said Head Coach Christina Sutcliffe PERIOD Thacker was able to get them to popup quite a bit which was really nice to see. senior first baseman Kayti Grable and Bekah Harnish junior catcher and infielder both went 2for3 PERIOD Grable drove in three runs and Harnish had a run and an RBI PERIOD

Sophomore outfielder Jessica Rio went 1for2 with two runs scored and a walk PERIOD Sutcliffe said she was a little nervous when the Cardinals scored in the first inning but the Huskies bounced back and had three great innings of scoring PERIOD

With two outs in the bottom of the second inning the Huskies scored three runs to take a  lead PERIOD Sophomore outfielder Jenny Van Geertry walked and advanced to second base on a single by Rio PERIOD

Harnish singled to right field to score Van Geertry and advanced to second base on an errant throw PERIOD

Grable doubled to center field to score Rio and Harnish PERIOD

In the bottom of the third inning sophomore outfielder Katie Lamich singled to left field and scored on a home run by sophomore infielder Sam Schmidt to give NIU a  lead which was all the offense it needed for the game PERIOD

Senior outfielder Rachel Houck sent Thackers pitch over the left field fence to tack on one more run for the Cardinals in the top of the seventh inning but a line out and two strikeouts later ended the game and gave NIU the win PERIOD

The Huskies will be back in action this weekend in a fourgame series against Western Michigan University beginning with a game  p.m PERIOD Friday in Kalamazoo Michigan PERIOD

DeKALB  Softball won its threegame weekend series against the Kent State University Golden Flashes in three tightly contested games.The teams split Saturdays doubleheader with Kent State   taking the first game  and NIU winning.. PERIOD

This weeks episode of Northern Star Press Box we sit down with NIU softball players Kayti Grable Tara Thacker and Alex Frenz PERIOD We talked about karaoke songs team tattoos and preseasonconference play.Hosts Sports Editor Scott A PERIOD Nicol and sports writer.. PERIOD

Members of the softball team gather at the mound in Fridays first game against University of Akron Zips PERIOD The Huskies went on to defeat the Zips in this game  PERIOD

Softball  moved over . for the first time this season picking up four wins in the Grand Canyon University Invitational over the weekend.The Huskies played a total of five games over the weekend including two against Texas State University two.. PERIOD
